text: Poselyayte ikh tam, gde vy sami poselilis' - po vashemu dostatku. Ne prichinyayte im vreda, daby ne postavit' v trudnoye polozheniye. A yesli oni beremenny, to soderzhite ikh, poka ne razreshatsya ot bremeni. Yesli oni kormyat [grud'yu] vashikh [detey], to platite im i vedite mezhdu soboy peregovory po-dobromu. Yesli zhe vy ne dogovorites' po-dobromu, to priglashayte [dlya kormleniya] kormilitsu
